allow: Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -m pip install sentence-transformers==2.2.2 faiss-cpu==1.7.4 numpy==1.24.3 scikit-learn==1.3.0)
Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -m pip install sentence-transformers==2.2.2 faiss-cpu==1.9.0.post1 scikit-learn==1.3.0)
Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -m pip install sentence-transformers faiss-cpu scikit-learn --upgrade)
Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -m pip install chromadb ollama aiohttp asyncio)
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp show --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group rg-ai-client-discovery --query ''{state:state,hostNames:hostNames}'' -o json")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp show --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group --query ''{state:state,hostNames:hostNames,httpsOnly:httpsOnly,defaultHostName:defaultHostName}'' -o json")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp deployment source show --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group -o json")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp deployment source config --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group --repo-url https://github.com/Taskfree07/AI-Client-Discovery.git --branch Branch-B --manual-integration")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Set-Location ''E:\\Techgene\\AI Client Discovery''; Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath deploy.zip -Force -CompressionLevel Optimal")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Set-Location ''E:\\Techgene\\AI Client Discovery''; Get-ChildItem -Exclude ''venv'',''.venv'',''nul'',''deploy.zip'',''instance'',''*.db'' | Compress-Archive -DestinationPath deploy.zip -Force")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp deployment source config-zip --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group --src ''E:\\Techgene\\AI Client Discovery\\deploy.zip''")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp config appsettings list --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group -o table")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp deployment list-publishing-profiles --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group -o json")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp deploy --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group --src-path ''E:\\Techgene\\AI Client Discovery\\deploy.zip'' --type zip --async true")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp deploy --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group --src-path ''E:\\Techgene\\AI Client Discovery\\deploy.zip'' --type zip")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp stop --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group; Start-Sleep -Seconds 5; az webapp start --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az webapp deploy --name ai-client-discovery --resource-group TECHGENE_group --src-path ''E:\\Techgene\\AI Client Discovery\\deploy.zip'' --type zip --timeout 600")
